document_data.name: Gregori the Broken
document_data.mainbody: ring the operation of the Wheloon Prison, the [[Night Brigade]] gang took over part of the city. [[Agarta the Breaker]] operated a [[Battlemaster's Arenas|series of arenas]] where gladiatorial beasts and prisoners were pitted against each other, whether locals or not. The Purple Dragon knight Ser Gregori was one of these victims, and his remains were dumped along with the others in a small flower-dotted clearing. When the [[Riverside Rats]] sent a team into the prison to take out Agarta, Ser Gregori rose from the dead as a powerful skeleton warrior along with a small army of zombies to attack whoever they could find, before finally being laid to rest.

When the [[Riverside Rats]] sent a team into the prison to take out Agarta, Ser Gregori rose from the dead as a powerful skeleton warrior along with a small army of zombies to attack whoever they could find, before finally being laid to rest.
